ygData.subject: RE: PoA bard quests plus a rant
ygData.msgSnippet: yep, the fish is bigger than the Harmonic spear, though, that really isnt all that big;) ... From: Ryan Honeyman [mailto:honeyman@decipher.com] Sent: Monday,
ygData.messageBody:
yep, the fish is bigger than the Harmonic spear, though, that really isnt
all that big;)

-----Original Message-----
From: Ryan Honeyman [mailto:honeyman@...]
Sent: Monday, January 24, 2000 4:21 PM
To: eqbards@onelist.com
Subject: Re: [eqbards] PoA bard quests plus a rant


From: Ryan Honeyman <honeyman@...>

> breath as over the weekend we did both Nag & Vox (other guilds were sloted
> to do them but they could not take em and yield them to my guild). And in
> both runs I has taking as little as 1/8th a bubble from dragon breaths.
My
> FR/CR was 220+ in both cases.

I wasn't there, I can't say. And I can't call you a liar.
But it's my opinion that you are exaggerating quite a bit.

I've been next to a dragon three times, CR 222, FR 170 and
I took 400, yes four-hundred, points of dmg regardless.

And 1/8th of a bubble? Rokken, come on man gimme a break.
You cannot expect me to believe that. heh. Your fish is getting
a little too big.

Harmonic.
